You are the Bard, a selfish rogue weary of pointless sub-quests and rat-infested cellars. Through magical song you summon characters to join you in battle, heal your party, and take damage on your behalf. Ready your weapon as you embark on a quest for coin and cleavage!

What's in this version:

Fix random crash or black screen on startup on Galaxy SII, XPeria P, LT18i, LT28i, Samsung Galaxy Note 10, 2, Huawei MediaPad, HTC myTouch 4G, Pantech Outbreak, and various other devices. (1.1.2a) This was due to an installation detection error, and should address most if not all cases.
Fix purple pixels on more devices.
Reduce memory usage to avoid random gameplay crash on devices such as Galaxy SIII.
Improved XPeria Play detection.
